===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Arlecchino)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' Ah, yes, I've seen the children play this game, so I'm familiar with the rules. A round, you say? As you wish.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Let me adjust my deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Arlecchino's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' Oh?

;(When the player defeats two of Arlecchino's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' Well played.

;(When Arlecchino defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' Well? Go on.

;(When Arlecchino uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' Let me show you how this ends.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' The children would love to see you. Feel free to come pay them a visit, should you have the time.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card arlecchino invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Arlecchino:''' All that staring... Were you attempting to read my emotions? Or gauge the strength of my hand? Not a bad thought, but unsuccessful, I'm afraid.
{{Dialogue End}}
